newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Sybase estimates lowered.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Sybase estimates lowered.

text.p: -- Hanifen Imhoff Inc on Friday lowered its estimate for Sybase Inc's 1997 earnings to $0.45 a share from $0.58, and its 1988 estimate to $0.75 from $1.00.
-- The firm said the revised estimates reflected the current uncertainty surrounding the software tools market.
-- Sybase on Thursday reported fourth-quarter earnings of $0.07 a share, falling short of Hanifen's estimate of $0.08 but exceeding analysts' consensus estimate by a penny.
-- The company would have met Hanifen's estimate if sales of software tools were a little stronger, the firm said.
-- Shares of Sybase, which provides software and services to create information management systems, were up 5/8 at 19-3/8 in early afternoon trading on the Nasdaq.
